elementica.NAME: Media Digital Invest
elementica.TITLE: Web application development and database management
elementica.DESCRIPTION: During my internship, I worked on the design of user interfaces and database management for various projects. Developed a web application to manage the back-office of MDI using advanced tools and frameworks. TECHNOLOGIES: Laravel, React, MySQL, Figma, UML

freelance.NAME: Astrolabe Media

portfolio.TITLE: Explore my projects
portfolio.SUBTITLE: Main projects I have developed and contributed to, showcasing my skills and expertise

tutiffy.NAME: Citronix
tutiffy.MAIN_INFO: Developed an innovative application to manage lemon farms, providing advanced agricultural tracking and efficient RESTful services.

p_1.TEXT_2: Main goal of this app is to empower children and students to explore, imagine and engage with ideas as they learn and to help parents or family members to communicate with children by participating in lessons, games, and even sharing story time.
p_1.TEXT_3: Project had a complex structure with 6 frontend apps and 7 backend microservices on Node.js and Python. Core features - live chat/video streams, live activities between users, multitenancy, internationalization, user generated content, moderation, kids accounts, payments, automated/manual tests, CI/CD, etc.

p_2.TEXT_1: On the project, I focused on interface development, including creating user-friendly navigation, designing and placing educational content, and interacting with the backend through REST API or GraphQL.
p_2.TEXT_2: Additionally, I worked on enhancing the user experience by adding animations, intuitive controls, and optimized workflows.
p_2.TEXT_3: Overall, working on the project was an interesting and productive experience that helped me develop skills in frontend development, multilingual support, and web application performance optimization.

ASX.NAME: ASX Sports
ASX.MAIN_INFO: Developed a sports betting platform. Core features include a selection of sports and bet types, live streaming, statistics and analytics, a personal wallet, as well as bonuses and promotions

p_1.TEXT_1: Frontend team - 2 developers. Backend team - 2 developers. QA team - 1 developer.
p_1.TEXT_2: The project was a multifaceted platform that allowed users to register their accounts, buy in-game currency, and place bets on their favorite teams during live streams.
p_1.TEXT_3: Consisted of a core platform as well as an admin panel through which the administrator could fully manage the core application and user support.

p_2.TEXT_1: The app is developed using Next for the frontend part and Express for the backend part.
p_2.TEXT_2: On the project I was engaged in development of UI components, implementation of new features such as - full user registration using Keycloack, connection of Stripe payment system, connection of SumSab library for user verification, etc. I also got experience in the backend.
p_2.TEXT_3: What I found interesting was participating in rallies with the CTO and the customer where we discussed the business logic of the application. I also enjoyed expressing my ideas, which in the future were turned into reality.

maven.NAME: Maven 11
maven.DESCR: Landing page for a crypto fund
maven.MAIN_INFO: Developed a landing page for a cryptocurrency fund include an attractive design, information about the fund and its transparency, interactive charts, investor testimonials

p_1.TEXT_1: Frontend team - 1 developer. QA team - 1 developer.
p_1.TEXT_2: Landing page for a foundation, main goal to attract new clients.
p_1.TEXT_3: The project is implemented using HTML, SCSS, and the GSAP library. The task I was given was to create a dynamic website using animations.

p_2.TEXT_1: On the project, I did the development on my own under the guidance of the CTO. I solved all the technical tasks and problems myself, which gave me experience in organizing projects.
p_2.TEXT_2: The interesting and challenging part for me was working with the GSAP library, where it took a lot of time to learn all the intricacies and the right approach, which gave me additional experience in developing complex animations.
p_2.TEXT_3: Also together with QA we conducted functional testing and fixed all the issues in a short period of time.

aboutMe.TITLE: About me
aboutMe.TECHNOLOGIES_SUB_TITLE: The basic technologies I use in my work
aboutMe.MY_CAREER: I'm a Full-stack developer with experience in building scalable and efficient web applications. My focus is on creating solutions that are both user-friendly and technically robust, adhering to industry best practices.
aboutMe.HOBBIES: Sports, exploring new technologies, traveling, and spending time learning about software trends. I also enjoy contributing to collaborative projects and maintaining an active lifestyle
aboutMe.DEVELOPMENT: My journey into development began with an interest in problem-solving and technology. I started with small projects and quickly discovered a passion for creating impactful software solutions. Over time, I honed my skills through education, internships, and self-learning, leading me to become a professional full-stack developer
aboutMe.QUALITIE_TEAMWORK_TEXT: Proficient in collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality results.
aboutMe.QUALITIE_ADAPTABILITY_TEXT: ready to work in a dynamic environment and make technical decisions to achieve common goals.
aboutMe.QUALITIE_LEARNING_TEXT: committed to keeping up with industry trends and expanding technical skills.
